file.name: parameter-anon-empty-object.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: unit test
  version: 0.0.1
paths:
  /customer/expired:
    get:
      parameters:
        - name: offset
          in: query
          required: true
          description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set
        - name: limit
          in: query
          required: false
          description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set
      responses:
        '200':  
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: 
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Customer'
components:
  schemas:
    Customer:
      properties:
        firstName:
          type: string
        lastName:
          type: string

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /customer/expired: get: parameters: parse parameter "offset": parameter MUST contain either a schema property, or a content property
